sentences.sContent: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 他昨天被警察审问了两次。

sentences.sContent: None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over .
sentences.sCn: 我们的晚餐菜单从没有完全重样的。

sentences.sContent: They employ 90 people, twice as many as last year.
sentences.sCn: 他们雇用了90人，是去年的两倍。

phrases.pCn: 三思而后再决定做某事
adv. 在第二次时；分两次
